original: Niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

original: Niyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
